name: RI_1_1_17_Deprecate_Record_Lifecycle_Event
title: RI.1.1.17 Deprecate Record Lifecycle Event (Function)
description: Deprecate Record Entries (1 or more instances)
purpose:
Occurs when an agent causes the system to tag record entry(ies) as obsolete, erroneous or untrustworthy, to warn against its future use. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.17.

statement.label: RI.1.1.17#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to tag Record Entries as deprecated/retracted and indicating that they are invalid according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.
